1997年後由工黨執政的英國政府被指通過秘密談判試圖將直布羅陀交還給西班牙以博取歐盟的好感[8]，直布羅陀在2002年舉行了公民投票，對由英國與西班牙共同管治該地的提議作出表決，但最終該提議卻被比率高達98.97%的反對票否定


2016年的英國去留歐盟公投，直布羅陀96%選民選擇留在歐盟，引發西班牙再次對其主權申索主張。西班牙外相加西亞-馬加略（José Manuel García-Margallo）表示將尋求與英國共治直布羅陀，並最終全權管治直布羅陀。唯直布羅陀首席部長費邊·皮卡多（英語：Fabian Picardo）（Fabian Picardo）隨即否定加西亞的説法，指先前的地方公投已反對共同管治，強調「不存在任何有關直布羅陀主權會談的空間，連會談的會談對話也不可能」，呼籲直布羅陀居民無須理會。

搵到篇文歸納左國旗設計幾個要點：
https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/we-asked-a-vexillologist-how-to-design-a-great-national-flag
1. 線條簡單
2. 要好遠都辨認到
3. 少於三隻色
4. 顏色組合對比度高 (唔好藍+綠 黃+白)
5. 盡量唔好同其他國家撞色
6. 有意思

顏色的意思
https://www.wikihow.com/Design-a-Flag
Black: determination, ethnic heritage, bravery, and/or defeating one's enemies.
Blue: freedom, vigilance：, perseverance, loyalty, justice, prosperity, peace, patriotism, water.
Green: the Earth, agriculture, luck, and/or fertility.
Red: courage, communism, revolution, hardiness, blood, and/or valor.
White: peace, purity, snow, and/or innocence.
Yellow: the sun, wealth, and/or justice.
Pink: feminism.
Gray: selflessness.

搵到篇文歸納左國旗設計幾個要點：
https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/we-asked-a-vexillologist-how-to-design-a-great-national-flag
1. 線條簡單
2. 要好遠都辨認到
3. 少於三隻色
4. 顏色組合對比度高 (唔好藍+綠 黃+白)
5. 盡量唔好同其他國家撞色
6. 有意思

顏色的意思
https://www.wikihow.com/Design-a-Flag
Black: determination, ethnic heritage, bravery, and/or defeating one's enemies.
Blue: freedom, vigilance：, perseverance, loyalty, justice, prosperity, peace, patriotism, water.
Green: the Earth, agriculture, luck, and/or fertility.
Red: courage, communism, revolution, hardiness, blood, and/or valor.
White: peace, purity, snow, and/or innocence.
Yellow: the sun, wealth, and/or justice.
Pink: feminism.
Gray: selflessness.

搵到篇文歸納左國旗設計幾個要點：
https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/we-asked-a-vexillologist-how-to-design-a-great-national-flag
1. 線條簡單
2. 要好遠都辨認到
3. 少於三隻色
4. 顏色組合對比度高 (唔好藍+綠 黃+白)
5. 盡量唔好同其他國家撞色
6. 有意思

顏色的意思
https://www.wikihow.com/Design-a-Flag
Black: determination, ethnic heritage, bravery, and/or defeating one's enemies.
Blue: freedom, vigilance：, perseverance, loyalty, justice, prosperity, peace, patriotism, water.
Green: the Earth, agriculture, luck, and/or fertility.
Red: courage, communism, revolution, hardiness, blood, and/or valor.
White: peace, purity, snow, and/or innocence.
Yellow: the sun, wealth, and/or justice.
Pink: feminism.
Gray: selflessness.

有個網有得簡易砌下旗仔

黃：公義
藍：自由 (想用本民前藍，但太深色擺唔到在黑色隔離)

quote.msg:
搵到篇文歸納左國旗設計幾個要點：
https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/we-asked-a-vexillologist-how-to-design-a-great-national-flag
1. 線條簡單
2. 要好遠都辨認到
3. 少於三隻色
4. 顏色組合對比度高 (唔好藍+綠 黃+白)
5. 盡量唔好同其他國家撞色
6. 有意思

顏色的意思
https://www.wikihow.com/Design-a-Flag
Black: determination, ethnic heritage, bravery, and/or defeating one's enemies.
Blue: freedom, vigilance：, perseverance, loyalty, justice, prosperity, peace, patriotism, water.
Green: the Earth, agriculture, luck, and/or fertility.
Red: courage, communism, revolution, hardiness, blood, and/or valor.
White: peace, purity, snow, and/or innocence.
Yellow: the sun, wealth, and/or justice.
Pink: feminism.
Gray: selflessness.

有個網有得簡易砌下旗仔

黑色三角：勇敢的革命先驅
黃：公義
藍：自由 (想用本民前藍，但太深色擺唔到在黑色隔離)
